#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long int a,b;
    cin>>a>>b;
    while(a!=0 && b!=0)
    {
        int carry=0;
        int carrier=0;
        while(a>0 && b>0)
        { 
        int rem1=a%10;
        int rem2=b%10;
        if(rem1+rem2+carrier>=10)
        carry++;
        carrier=(rem1+rem2+carrier)/10;
        a=a/10;
        b=b/10;
        }
        if(carry==0)
        cout<<"No carry operation."<<endl;
        else if(carry==1)
        cout<<"1 carry operation."<<endl;
        else
        cout<<carry<<" carry operations."<<endl;
        cin>>a>>b;
    }
    return 0;
}
